about_the_game:
Version

Aver.Aza18012025Aza (a18-01-2025a Ver.)


About Game

This is a simple semi-nsfw themed JRPG. This JRPG is created using RPG Developer Bakin. This game belongs to the Animeahikoaprinceaverse universe, each game has a different universe and story, although a little similar. This JRPG is very short and can be completed in less than 15-45 minutes, with an emphasis on story elements and defeat all monster boss from various dungeons. The player is given an unqiue skill (1 hit skill) for player who want for players who want to finish this game more quickly, so the players can only enjoy the story elements in it. intended for casual gamers.

Note 1: All 2 princesses or heroines character design are inspired from princess Solange (Code of Princess) with quite a lot of modification.

Note 2: All main characters age are over 18.

Note 3: Animeahikoaprinceaverses are Akihiko Prince's intellectual property. Part of Japan/Nihon's art and culture and part of Japan/Nihon and Indonesia's product. Akihiko Prince is a paternal grandson of Colonel (Purn.) Prince (Raden) A.S.Son.S. The protagonist, A Micro Prince Akihiko Adisony Azumeragi is a self-insert character of Akihiko Prince.


Story

When the prince of the kingdom was cursed, rendering his magic uncontrollable, he fell into depression as he didn't want to interact with others for fear of harming them with his uncontrolled magic. However, the curse weakened when the prince was near his two fiancées. One of his fiancées managed to discover the origin of the curse, and they embarked on an adventure to lift the curse from the prince.


Features

  • RPG battle turn based

  • Adventure up to 3 dungeon and 3 village (Easy Mode, only focus on story)

content_descriptors.notes: Revealing clothers for the MC and Heroine aka Bikini Armor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A Prince Akihiko was cursed, rendering his magic uncontrollable, However, the curse weakened when the prince was near his two fiancées. One of his fiancées managed to discover the origin of the curse, and they embarked on an adventure to lift the curse from the prince. Aza18012025Aza.
